question: Show hotels and sleep pod that cost 150.
sql_query1:
SELECT Hotel.Airport_Hotel as name
FROM Hotel
WHERE Hotel.Price = "150"
UNION
SELECT SleepPod.Sleep_Pod as name
FROM SleepPod
WHERE SleepPod.Price = "150"
sql_query2:
SELECT Hotel.Airport_Hotel as name
FROM Hotel
UNION
SELECT SleepPod.Sleep_Pod as name
FROM SleepPod
WHERE SleepPod.Price = "150"
interpretation1: Which hotels cost 150 and which sleep pods cost the same price?
interpretation2: Provide a list of all hotels and also provide a list of all sleep pods that cost 150.
